gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `InvestmentsInParticipatingInterests` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `InvestmentsInParticipatingInterests` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `FinancialAssetsMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancialAssetsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancialAssetsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`FinancialAssetsMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_FinancialAssetsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_FinancialAssetsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfFinancialAssetsMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfFinancialAssetsMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfFinancialAssetsMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfFinancialAssetsMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
